## Project Overview
[London plane trees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London_plane) release their seeds in spring. Since they are so abundant in Buenos Aires City, the season is noticeable by almost everyone due to the annoyance of frequent sneezing and seeds getting into one's eyes.

## Results and analysis

The *comunas* with the most plane trees are:

1. <u>Comuna 15</u>: Agronomía, Paternal, Parque Chas, Chacarita, Villa Crespo, Villa Ortúzar
2. <u>Comuna 11</u>: Villa del Parque, Villa Devoto, Villa Gral. Mitre, Villa Santa Rita
3. <u>Comuna 14</u>: Palermo
